TF022452-OTF:CHINA ODS III PPA IX,TF020738-OTF: CHINA-ADV VIII THIRD
            MONTREAL PROTOCOL ODS PHASEOUT PROJ.,TF021937-OTF - PPA FOR CHINA ODS III,TF022002-OTF-CHINA ODS III

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Third Montreal
            Protocol Ozone Depleting (ODS) Substances Phase Out Project
            are to: 1) support China's total ODS phaseout program
            by establishing an efficient and flexible institutional
            mechanism to prepare, appraise, finance and implement a
            large number of subprojects; 2) implement cost-effective
            priority subprojects; and 3) allow ODS phaseout to proceed
            at or ahead of current schedule. The project will support 60
            to 80 subprojects in all ODS user and producer industries.
            The subprojects will provide: 1) technical and financial
            assistance to enterprises for technology transfer, design,
            training and implementation; 2) assistance in closing
            Chlorofluorocarbons (CFC) production and halon plants; and
            3) technical assistance to the National Environmental
            Protection Agency (NEPA) and the financial agents in project
            development and implementation.
